text: List of canals in Oregon contains all canals identified by the USGS in the U.S. state of Oregon. The USGS defines a canal as a manmade waterway used by watercraft or for drainage, irrigation, mining, or water power (ditch, lateral). There are 661 listed as of December 4, 2008. {| class="wikitable sortable" ! name !! county !! elevation !! coordinate !!
